forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 61. West wind 16 to 26 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West wind 20 to 26 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph.

weather_report:
As the day unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, the scene is set with a gentle clarity, though the horizon still holds hints of a soft veil. The morning light, just breaking, reveals a predominantly sunny disposition, albeit tempered by the familiar breeze from the west. Winds dance through the streets, causing the trees to sway slightly and carrying an invigorating chill that reminds one of the ocean’s ever-present influence.

Currently, you can expect a high of around 61 degrees, perfect for a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero where the myriad of boats bob in the bay’s gentle swell. While fog is not overtly present, there are whispers of the marine layer clinging close to the Golden Gate, suggesting it might roll in later as the day gives way to evening. As twilight approaches, the skies will transition to a serene partial cloudiness, offering a cooler low, ideal for wrapping up in a light jacket. 

This is a splendid day to engage with the essence of city life—perhaps indulging in a visit to a quaint café for morning coffee, followed by an invigorating walk through the lush greenery of Golden Gate Park. Embrace the fresh air; wear layers, as the winds may bite at times, but coupled with the sun’s warmth, it creates an inviting atmosphere for casual adventures.
